about_the_game:
Enter a mysterious facility where something strange lurks in the dark. Bring your friend, you will not survive alone.

Unlock abilities to discover the true extent of the facility's secrets. Discover more about the invisible creatures that won’t leave you to do your work. Decode the symbols and solve puzzles that block your path.

Features:

  • Co-op gameplay

  • Communicate and share unique information available to each player

  • Solve environment puzzles

  • Gain new abilities to reconfigure the maze

  • Decode the ciphered language

  • Fend against invisible creatures

*Elsewhere Electric is made with the generous support of the Canada Media Fund and Ontario Creates.

name: Elsewhere Electric

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+ 64-bit versions only
  • Processor: Intel Core i%-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Raedon R9 290
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • VR Support: Steam VR, Oculus Quest 2 and 3
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • VR Support: Steam VR, Oculus Quest 2 and 3
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A puzzle game powered by two: Navigate a mysterious facility to charge devices, solve puzzles, and reconfigure the map as you see fit. Uncover the secrets of the facility that await you both at its confounding core. Bring your friend, because you will not survive alone.
